Reviews.Title: Great for a low price
Reviews.Author: E. Romo

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo8YGQ9RNIIJVScurrentClick) { return cv_mo8YGQ9RNIIJVScurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 0:33 MinsI had read previous reviews of this item and was kind of skeptical of purchasing it, but for the price I figured I would give it a shot. I am very pleased that I did. I read that the colors were bad, but the color is great. I also read that the distance at night was only half of what the product claims, but the distance is at least 90 feet.I am very pleased with this purchase and if I need another camera in the future, this camera will be my first option.Here is a compiled video that I took using this camera from two different places. One is at night and the other during the day. The fence is about 70 feet from the camera during the night shot. As you can see, the cat on the fence is easily seen from that distance. The color during the day shot speaks for itself.

Reviews.Title: If you want security - forget it
Reviews.Author: Junior111
Reviews.Content: I wanted to upgrade my Security DVR from 420DVL cameras to something better. I found this camera and good reviews and ordered one. The daytime color improvement was impressive when compared to the 420TVL.  I ordered 2 more of this model. One of those was basically dead on arrival. It didn't work at night. I had to return it. Amazon refunded fast.  Then the second camera started to blink in and out, especially in the transitions between dawn and dusk. It takes several minutes of in/out/no signal blinking before the picture stabilizes. If you need any footage in emergencies it would be worthless.The locking mechanism is also not well thought through. I have a location were some Blue Jays want to sit on top of the camera, and every time they do the cam position  needs to be re-adjusted. This is only good for you if you need the exercise to schlepp a 10-foot ladder around to adjust several cameras in hard-to-reach places.  All in all I hate to say this: I would give this camera a minus-1 if I could and I do this very seldom to any product. But when 2 out of 3 cameras are not working properly you are wasting valuable time and money. Finally I upgraded to a 600TVL camera for barely $10 more than this one and the 600TVL works flawlessly, much better resolution at day and night. For peace of mind I would recommend  cameras with a minimum of 600TVL and CCD system. (not CMOS!)

Reviews.Title: Decent IR CMOS Camera, Good Value
Reviews.Author: Big Rat
Reviews.Content: Good distance: with IR on, 50 to 60 feet, clearly, further distances resolution becomes an issue. In daylight clear images to 100 feet with ease. Much further, resolution is again an issue. There is a mechanical relay that switches between B&W;/IR LED's or an IR filter for daylight. There is some twitchiness to the relay during transitional periods, not a problem in my opinion. Other IR devices such as security lights may be hampered by the camera's IR output, it is significant. Reduced sensitivity in affected devices usually compensates. This is the best performing, low cost IR camera I have found. I am quite satisfied. The only con would be the supplied mount, not very substantial.

Reviews.Title: Ok by price
Reviews.Author: Ricardo J. Cruz
Reviews.Content: This product by price it's a good item. Work by any regular system. Use 12 volt dc power and work in the night

Reviews.Title: night vision very poor full of static
Reviews.Author: landloard
Reviews.Content: camera looks good, it is large and easy to see...  day time works well up to about 80 feet..  night time very poor hard to see faces, even at 15 feet.  daytime good / night time  very poor...

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Cindy Vos
Reviews.Content: Very clear picture nice quality camera easy hookup and install.  Great price shipped very fast thanks.  Would recommend to anyone

Reviews.Title: Not used yet, bought to test PCI Board.
Reviews.Author: E. Cady
Reviews.Content: The item arrived ahead of schedule and in excellent condition.  I expected that it would come with a power adapter but there none in the box.  Every other VideoSecu  Camera I have purchased had a power adapter with it but not this one, that is why I am the seller a 4 star rating in lieu of a 5 star.  Fortunately, I have several spare power adapters to replace failed adapters.

Reviews.Title: Good for cost
Reviews.Author: andrew "PFC Brian"
Reviews.Content: This camera like many the night sight is less then listed but thats nothing new.  The camera is solid and seems well made.  Winter is starting so we will see how it holds in the elements .  Camera display is not as clear as sony cameras i use but still good.  If your buying this camera for a small space move on cause this camera is pretty zoomed in

Reviews.Title: Started off good, ended poorly!
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for four months...it has officially stopped working! I believe that the IR cut-off switch is broken, so it just flickers constantly, which causes my DVR system to catch this as "movement," and therefore takes up all the space. This camera is no good and cheap! Stay away!!!

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: gary stillian
Reviews.Content: it has a good clear picture day or night for the price you can't do better i would buy this camera again

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Bill Schebeck
Reviews.Content: Works well.  Would like a wider angle view but its better than some and costs less than most.  Well built but the mounting bracket is tricky to adjust.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality at night
Reviews.Author: nestor
Reviews.Content: Dear Amazon TeamI am really disapointed with this product, basicly the problem is at night, during day the quality of the vision is good but at night I can't see any thing. The quality of can at night is poor. I wish to know if I can return the product or change this for another product with more vision at night. If you required more details please contact me through my e-mail : nestorurdanetaf@hotmail.com and I will sent you more details about the camera.Best RegardsNestor

Reviews.Title: Day/night camera
Reviews.Author: Patf
Reviews.Content: Decent camera for the price. Would be nice if it could be focused. The bracket is really cheap. I suggest using something different.

Reviews.Title: very grainy at night
Reviews.Author: kevin
Reviews.Content: The color day view is good and range is good up to about 20 feet after that image is blurred. At night is when this camera is better used as a door stop. Very brainy and I've walked back and forth through the viewing range and I was blurred. You really couldn't tell who it was. Don't recommend for anything other than day viewing or indoor.

Reviews.Title: It's Okay
Reviews.Author: Macy
Reviews.Content: I though that the resolution would be better.  This camera is not what I thought it was.  It works about as well as the cheaper cameras.  I would recommend spending a little more money to get the better resolution.

Reviews.Title: Questionable
Reviews.Author: jtybt
Reviews.Content: I have been buying security cameras since the X10 almost 20 years ago. I presently have 16 cameras around the house and 5 on my cargo van(windowless type).All the cameras have had good daylight pictures if not the crisp, sharp picture of say a digital camera.The night vision separating the good from the bad...and the number of IR LED's dictating the overall night vision.I expected a 36 LED with 520 TVL to have very good night vision. Of the two I bought, one had fairly crisp(contrast) night vision but poor visibility overall due to poor 'lighting' from the LED's.The second camera had good day pictures but the night vision was non-existent. I'm guessing the problem with both cameras was due to faulty IR LED's.A little FYI. I have found the cameras with the better mounting bracket to have better quality cameras. I know it doesn't have anything to do with the cameras themselves, BUT, it may have to do with the overall quality.Hope this helps!

Reviews.Title: Good camera quality but you skimped on the mount.
Reviews.Author: pacolux
Reviews.Content: These cameras are real good quality.  Pure day colors and crisp night vision.  However the mounts are horrible.  The drift and wobble and two of my 4 stripped out during install.  That's what got it a 3 star.  The mounts are just as important as the camera.

Reviews.Title: So So
Reviews.Author: Albert
Reviews.Content: I started to search for some IR cameras for my DVR that I bought locally. I ordered 4 different cameras from Amazon to compare night/ day/ distance. I was looking for mainly an all purpose outside camera. This camera was one of the first to arrive. I really expected the daytime quality to be better than what I saw. The inside light view was fuzzy looking, outside better picture, and night time was close to being washed out (very light) and hard to see much of anything. I made brightness adjustments to the camera from inside the DVR and the camera night viewing improved significantly. The outside distance with daylight was fair to about 90 feet viewing. I couldn't quite get the video clarity with the DVR camera adjustmensts so I will be sending this camera back. Also, this camera came with no power supply. Luckily I have a multiple supply power "pigtail" adapter on hand.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camers
Reviews.Author: Anthony Gordon
Reviews.Content: Very good excellent graphics. This camera is worth the buy as the graphics are clean and crisp and worth the buty.

Reviews.Title: Alright CCTV Camera
Reviews.Author: KM
Reviews.Content: For the price you can't go wrong color is sharp for the most part during the day night a little brighter than a 400 series camera does the job have to wait and see how long this will last.

Reviews.Title: DOA,second one died!
Reviews.Author: ronco
Reviews.Content: UPDATE,,the second one died soon after i got it,set it aside and forgot about it and missed the return window  :(If it was'nt DOA i could give a better review.Having several of these cheap cam's what i liked about it was it is not as long as the others.The hood slide works better.Longer electrical connecters than others.Mounting bolt hole not tapped out all the way,had to use a spacer to mount.i returned but would take a replacement but that option not offered.So i ordered another one.this second one is awsome for the price !!the clarity and color during daylight is better than my other cam's costing twice as much.At night the IR image in black and white is also very good.tnx to Amazon's no hassle return on the first one i bought i took a chance on another and am glad i did  .

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: A. Lewis "OBNXS1"
Reviews.Content: Get VideoSecu CCTV Home Video Outdoor CCD Bullet Security Camera Day Night 24 IR Infrared LEDs with Free Power Supply 1CJ instead of this. This one blinks and jumps in anything but full light and absolute dark. Even in full dark it throws IR spotlight outside and you can't see anything outside that cone of light. Look at pictures of this camera and the other one in this review and decide for yourself where to spend your $30.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: I don't like typing so much on this .should be allowed to only type a sentence. need to work on not moving price up and down

Reviews.Title: Is bad seller and bad bad bad items
Reviews.Author: Jhosnon BAsora
Reviews.Content: cameras are not as described, are bad enough cameras, night vision does not work, the picture is terrible, c not distinguish colors well, really bad very bad and poor quality ..."

Reviews.Title: the color is terrible
Reviews.Author: tom, hartwell,ga
Reviews.Content: This camera was cheap,but you get what you pay for The color in the day time is almost black and white with very little color.Night time it shows good with very little light for short distance.If you need good color,buy something else.

ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable day night CMOS security camera. Easy connection to TV, VCR, quad processor or DVR
High Resolution camera up to 520 TVL. Built-in 6.0mm Lens
36 IR illuminators for night vision. NTSC signal system
Built-in light sensor. Built-in mechanical IR-Cut filter switch
Aluminum housing with metal bracket
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Day Night Vision Weatherproof 520TVL Home Bullet Security Camera 36 IR Infrared LEDs with IR Cut Filter Switch for CCTV DVR Surveillance System WK2
